title: Canon PowerShot SX740 HS 20.3MP 4K Digital Camera
description:
Capture stunning photos and ultra high-definition videos with the Canon PowerShot SX740 HS 20.3MP 4K Digital Camera. This compact and lightweight point & shoot camera delivers powerful performance with its 40x optical zoom and 20.3MP resolution, allowing you to shoot crystal-clear images even from a distance.

The camera features 4K video recording, Bluetooth connectivity, built-in Wi-Fi, and a 3.0" screen for easy preview and control. Weighing only 9.7 oz, it's perfect for travel and everyday photography. This unit is in excellent pre-owned condition (95% new), fully functional and ready to use.

Key Features:
- 20.3 Megapixel resolution for sharp, detailed images
- 40x Optical Zoom + 4x Digital Zoom for versatile shooting
- 4K Ultra HD video recording
- 3.0" LCD screen
- Built-in Bluetooth and Wi-Fi for easy sharing and remote control
- Lightweight and compact design (9.7 oz)
- USB & HDMI connectivity
- Powered by NB-13L rechargeable battery
- Model: Canon PowerShot SX740 HS
